name: Donquixote Rosinante
text: Once Per Turn: If your [Trafalgar Law] would be K.O'd, you may add the top card of your Life pile to your hand instead. Activate: Main: Once Per Turn: DON!! -1: During this turn, the next time you play [Trafalgar Law] from your hand with a cost of 4 or more will have its cost reduced by 2.

effect.text: If your [Trafalgar Law] would be K.O'd, you may add the top card of your Life pile to your hand instead.
During this turn, the next time you play [Trafalgar Law] from your hand with a cost of 4 or more will have its cost reduced by 2.
